revision.text:
<!--스포츠_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Sport
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = title }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별칭 | ontologyProperty = alias }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 연맹 | ontologyProperty = sportGoverningBody }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장비 | ontologyProperty = equipment }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인원 | ontologyProperty = teamSize }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 분류 | ontologyProperty = category }}
end}}
